name: My PlATinUM
love_letter: Happy birthday my platinum the one who made every college bunk every movies everyjournies and every stolen moment feel like magic I know you are hurt but please remember no matter what I still choose you and I am deeply sorry you are my rarest treasure my plm and all I wish today is for your smile to return not just for your birthday but forever with me and Lets hug me tightly again.... let love me unconditionally..... hold my hand forever... I miss us ...I miss you  💕
